Definition.Name: MATI Enrichment
Definition.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.
Definition.Creator: e22b1df1-d620-4af5-ba42-d29e1b73bfe9

Steps.InstanceName: Select Entities with Threat Actors Associations
Steps.Name: Entity Selection
Steps.Description: Creates a group of entities that can be used in other actions. Use conditions to fine tune the group.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Create Entity
Steps.Description: Creates an entity and adds to requested alert. Note - Please make sure to read our documentation regarding the differences in the delimiter’s behavior, between different Siemplify’s platform versions 5.6.0 inclusive and 5.6.2 exclusive, here: https://cloud.google.com/chronicle/docs/soar/marketplace-integrations/siemplify#create-entity

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Case Tag
Steps.Description: Add given tag to the case the current alert is grouped to

Steps.Name: Tools_Add Alert Scoring Information
Steps.Description: This action will add an entry to the alert scoring database.  Alert score is based off the ratio: 5 Low = 1 Medium.  3 Medium = 1 High.  2 High = 1 Critical.  Optional tag added to case.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Name":"True","Description":"One or more IOCs have associations to malicious known threat actors ","Severity":"High","Category":"Mandiant-TI","Source":"Mandiant-TI  Threat Actors Association","Case Tag":""}

Steps.Name: MandiantThreatIntelligence_Enrich Entities
Steps.Description: Enrich entities using information from Mandiant. Supported entities: Hostname, IP Address, URL, File Hash, Threat Actor, Vulnerability. Note: only MD5, SHA-1 and SHA-256 are supported.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Severity Score Threshold":"50","Create Insight":true,"Only Suspicious Entity Insight":false}

Steps.Name: Tools_Add Alert Scoring Information
Steps.Description: This action will add an entry to the alert scoring database.  Alert score is based off the ratio: 5 Low = 1 Medium.  3 Medium = 1 High.  2 High = 1 Critical.  Optional tag added to case.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Name":"Benign","Description":"Mandiant Intelligence’s Risk Rating is Mandiant's expert assessment of what impact attackers could have on a targeted organization if they were to exploit a vulnerability.","Severity":"Low","Category":"Mandiant-TI","Source":"Mandiant-TI Score","Case Tag":""}

Steps.Name: Tools_Add Alert Scoring Information
Steps.Description: This action will add an entry to the alert scoring database.  Alert score is based off the ratio: 5 Low = 1 Medium.  3 Medium = 1 High.  2 High = 1 Critical.  Optional tag added to case.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Name":"Malicious","Description":"Mandiant Intelligence’s Risk Rating is Mandiant's expert assessment of what impact attackers could have on a targeted organization if they were to exploit a vulnerability.","Severity":"Critical","Category":"Mandiant-TI","Source":"Mandiant-TI Score","Case Tag":""}

Steps.Name: MandiantThreatIntelligence_Enrich Entities
Steps.Description: Enrich entities using information from Mandiant. Supported entities: Hostname, IP Address, URL, File Hash, Threat Actor, Vulnerability. Note: only MD5, SHA-1 and SHA-256 are supported.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Severity Score Threshold":"50","Create Insight":true,"Only Suspicious Entity Insight":false}

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: MandiantThreatIntelligence_Get Malware Details
Steps.Description: Get information about malware from Mandiant.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Malware Names":"[Entity.MandiantThreatIntelligence_attributed_associations_malware]","Create Insight":true,"Fetch Related IOCs":true,"Max Related IOCs To Return":"100"}

Steps.Name: Tools_Add Alert Scoring Information
Steps.Description: This action will add an entry to the alert scoring database.  Alert score is based off the ratio: 5 Low = 1 Medium.  3 Medium = 1 High.  2 High = 1 Critical.  Optional tag added to case.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Name":"True","Description":"One or more IOCs have identified associations to Known Malware","Severity":"High","Category":"Mandiant-TI","Source":"Mandiant-TI Malware Association","Case Tag":""}

ParallelActions.Name: Tools_Create Entity Relationships
ParallelActions.Description:
Creates a relationship between the supplied entities and the linked entities.  If the supplied entities do not exist, it will create them.
Supports Siemplify 5.6+ ONLY.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Entity Identifier(s)":"[Entity.MandiantThreatIntelligence_attributed_associations_threat-actor]","Entity Identifier(s) Type":"THREATACTOR","Connect As":"Linked","Target Entity Type":"FILEHASH","Target Entity Identifier(s)":"[Entity.Identifier]","Enrichment JSON":"","Separator Character":""}

Parameters.Name: SelectedScopeName
Parameters.Value: Select Entities with Threat Actors Associations.SelectedEntities

ParallelActions.Name: Tools_Create Entity Relationships
ParallelActions.Description:
Creates a relationship between the supplied entities and the linked entities.  If the supplied entities do not exist, it will create them.
Supports Siemplify 5.6+ ONLY.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Entity Identifier(s)":"[Entity.MandiantThreatIntelligence_attributed_associations_threat-actor]","Entity Identifier(s) Type":"THREATACTOR","Connect As":"Linked","Target Entity Type":"ADDRESS","Target Entity Identifier(s)":"[Entity.Identifier]","Enrichment JSON":"","Separator Character":""}

Parameters.Name: SelectedScopeName
Parameters.Value: Select Entities with Threat Actors Associations.SelectedEntities

ParallelActions.Name: Tools_Create Entity Relationships
ParallelActions.Description:
Creates a relationship between the supplied entities and the linked entities.  If the supplied entities do not exist, it will create them.
Supports Siemplify 5.6+ ONLY.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Entity Identifier(s)":"[Entity.MandiantThreatIntelligence_attributed_associations_threat-actor]","Entity Identifier(s) Type":"THREATACTOR","Connect As":"Linked","Target Entity Type":"DestinationURL","Target Entity Identifier(s)":"[Entity.Identifier]","Enrichment JSON":"","Separator Character":""}

Parameters.Name: SelectedScopeName
Parameters.Value: Select Entities with Threat Actors Associations.SelectedEntities

Steps.Name: Tools_Get Case Data
Steps.Description: This action will get all the data from a case and return a JSON result.  The result includes comments, entity information, insights, playbooks that ran, alert information and events.

Steps.InstanceName: Check If Malicious Entities from Mandiant
Steps.Name: TemplateEngine_Render Template
Steps.Description: This action will render a Jinja2 template using a JSON input.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
